quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.

categories.description: Fourth year into Computing and Financial Management Honours Co-op Program at University of Waterloo. I have worked 5 internships pertaining to web and software development at DBRS, Ashlin-BPG, BDO, and VPEC. On the side, I also take various online courses in Machine Learing for Trading, full-stack development, and Introduction to AI. I am also preparing to take on CFA exams as I have completed courses in Global Financial Markets, Corportate Finance, Fix-income Securities, and Derivatives.

I am passionate in playing violin and piano from a young age, and love to compete in music festivals and share music around the world. I also like to play basketball and tennis, and have joined the school team every year to compete in provincials. The following are some awards I received from past years:
listOfAwards: Top Financial Hacks and Data Visualization at PENNAPPS XIV
BC High School Sr. Tennis Provincials
